text: "Too Young" is a popular song. The music was written by Sidney Lippman. The lyrics were written by Sylvia Dee. The song was published in 1951. Many people have sung their own versions of it. One of the best-known versions of the song was recorded by Nat King Cole in 1951. It reached the number 1 position on the Billboard charts. A version by Donny Osmond in 1972 was also successful. It spent eight weeks on the record charts, with a peak position of #13. Michael Jackson also recorded a version of the song. ==References== Category:1951 songs Category:Nat King Cole songs Category:Sam Cooke songs Category:Michael Jackson songs Category:Johnny Mathis songs Category:Marvin Gaye songs Category:George Benson songs Category:Donny Osmond songs
title: Too Young (popular song)
